prompts.prompt: Show my current Microsoft 365 profile details, including name, email, mobile number, department, job title, hire date, and preferred language.

template.name: show-my-profile
template.title: Show my profile
template.description: Retrieves all key information from the signed-in user's Microsoft 365 profile.

prompts.prompt: List the people most relevant to me right now, including their display name, email address, office location, and department.

template.name: list-relevant-people
template.title: List relevant people
template.description: Shows a list of people that are currently most relevant to the signed-in user, with key contact details.

prompts.prompt: Show the top trending documents around me, with the document title and a short description for each.

template.name: list-trending-documents
template.title: List trending documents
template.description: Finds the documents that are currently trending around the signed-in user and provides a brief summary.

prompts.prompt: Which documents have I used or opened most recently? List the titles and types of my last 10 used documents.

template.name: list-recently-used-documents
template.title: List recently used documents
template.description: Shows the most recently or frequently used documents by the signed-in user.

prompts.prompt: Show me all Microsoft 365 groups or teams I am a member of, including the group name and type.

template.name: list-joined-groups
template.title: List joined groups
template.description: Lists all Microsoft 365 and security groups that the signed-in user has joined, with their names and types.
